PADA MARKERS

For a four-pada verse:
........  $ ........  &
........  % ........  //

For a six-pada verse:
........  $ ........  &
........  % ........  \
........  # ........  //


2-pada verses are marked with an 
asterisk after the first double danda: "  //* BrP_..."
